sql.sqlTxt: select t5.* ,RTRIM(CONVERT(decimal(18,2),t5.ZUOFEI*100.0/t5.NUM))+'%' as ZUIFEIPERC ,RTRIM(CONVERT(decimal(18,2),t5.TUIPIAO*100.0/t5.NUM))+'%' as TUIPIAOPERC from ( select t2.STR1 ,t2.INVOICE_TYPE , COUNT(*) NUM ,ZUOFEI=(select COUNT(*) from ( select t1.INVOICE_DATE,t1.INVOICE_TYPE,t1.STR1 ,t1.CANCELLED,t1.REVERSED from TBL_PA_VAT_INVOICE t1 where 1=1 @# group by t1.INVOICE_DATE,t1.STR1,t1.INVOICE_TYPE,t1.CANCELLED,t1.REVERSED ) t3 where t3.CANCELLED=1 and t2.INVOICE_TYPE=t3.INVOICE_TYPE AND t2.STR1=t3.STR1 ) ,TUIPIAO=(select COUNT(*) from ( select t1.INVOICE_DATE,t1.INVOICE_TYPE,t1.STR1,t1.CANCELLED,t1.REVERSED from TBL_PA_VAT_INVOICE t1 where 1=1 @# group by t1.INVOICE_DATE,t1.STR1,t1.INVOICE_TYPE,t1.CANCELLED,t1.REVERSED ) t4 where t4.REVERSED=1 and t2.INVOICE_TYPE=t4.INVOICE_TYPE AND t2.STR1=t4.STR1 ) from ( select t1.INVOICE_DATE,t1.INVOICE_TYPE,t1.STR1,t1.CANCELLED,t1.REVERSED from TBL_PA_VAT_INVOICE t1 where 1=1 @# group by t1.INVOICE_DATE,t1.STR1,t1.INVOICE_TYPE,t1.CANCELLED,t1.REVERSED ) t2 group by t2.STR1,t2.INVOICE_TYPE )t5

sql.sqlTxt: select t1.* ,t2.TERM_ACM from ( select BRANCH_NO ,IN_OUT_ACT = '0' ,BSPL_ACT = '2/4' ,ACT_CD ,ACCOUNT_NAME ,CCY_CD = '' ,CCY_ABBR ,SUM(AMOUNT_FC) [BALANCE] from VAT_DOCUMENT_SOURCE$ where 1=1 @# and YEAR(DATA_DATE) = YEAR(@DATA_DATE) and MONTH(DATA_DATE) >= 1 and MONTH(DATA_DATE) <=MONTH(@DATA_DATE) group by BRANCH_NO,ACT_CD,ACCOUNT_NAME,CCY_ABBR ) t1 left join ( select BRANCH_NO ,IN_OUT_ACT = '0' ,BSPL_ACT = '2/4' ,ACT_CD ,ACCOUNT_NAME ,CCY_CD = '' ,CCY_ABBR ,SUM(AMOUNT_FC) [TERM_ACM] from VAT_DOCUMENT_SOURCE$ where 1=1 @# and YEAR(DATA_DATE) = YEAR(@DATA_DATE) and MONTH(DATA_DATE) >= (case when MONTH(@DATA_DATE) <=6 then 1 else 7 end) and MONTH(DATA_DATE) <= MONTH(@DATA_DATE) group by BRANCH_NO,ACT_CD,ACCOUNT_NAME,CCY_ABBR ) t2 on t1.BRANCH_NO = t2.BRANCH_NO and t1.CCY_ABBR = t2.CCY_ABBR and t1.ACT_CD = t2.ACT_CD
